sn3.22:1.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho rajanam pasenadim kosalam bhagava etadavoca:
sn3.22:1.3: “handa kuto nu tvam, maharaja, agacchasi divadivassa”ti?
sn3.22:2.1: “Ayyika me, bhante, kalankata jinna vuddha mahallika addhagata vayoanuppatta visavassasatika jatiya.
sn3.22:2.2: Ayyika kho pana me, bhante, piya hoti manapa.
sn3.22:2.3: Hatthiratanena cepaham, bhante, labheyyam ‘ma me ayyika kalamakasi’ti, hatthiratanampaham dadeyyam:
sn3.22:2.5: Assaratanena cepaham, bhante, labheyyam ‘ma me ayyika kalamakasi’ti, assaratanampaham dadeyyam:
sn3.22:2.7: Gamavarena cepaham, bhante, labheyyam ‘ma me ayyika kalamakasi’ti, gamavarampaham dadeyyam:
sn3.22:2.9: Janapadapadesena cepaham, bhante, labheyyam ‘ma me ayyika kalamakasi’ti, janapadapadesampaham dadeyyam:
sn3.22:2.11: “Sabbe satta, maharaja, maranadhamma maranapariyosana maranam anatita”ti.
sn3.22:2.14: sabbe satta maranadhamma maranapariyosana maranam anatita’”ti.
sn3.22:3.2: Sabbe satta maranadhamma maranapariyosana maranam anatita.
sn3.22:3.3: Seyyathapi, maharaja, yani kanici kumbhakarabhajanani amakani ceva pakkani ca sabbani tani bhedanadhammani bhedanapariyosanani bhedanam anatitani;
sn3.22:3.4: evameva kho, maharaja, sabbe satta maranadhamma maranapariyosana maranam anatita”ti.
